title: Hexophilia 2 - Hexic 2 Unofficial Soundtrack from the Video Game
description:
Recorded and edited with Adobe Audition from the Xbox 360.  EAC/Lame to convert .wav\&#039;s to mp3\&#039;s at a 192kbps.

The original Hexic HD soundtrack \"Hexophilia\" can be found at http://lockjawlabs.com/blog/?page_id=5 . Download it.

There is no world on Hexic 2 getting a soundtrack officially, so here it is unofficially.  No track names (unless someone can get them).

Check other uploads I have, such as the Guitar Hero II songs by the actual artists (fuck covers). http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3684264/Various_Artists_-_Guitar_Hero_II_Soundtrack_Xbox_360_Version And also the Wii menu music http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3611428/Wii_Menu_Music
For you collectors of random audio clips, Xbox 360 boot up sounds http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3685377/Microsoft_Xbox_and_360_Boot_Up_Audio___Achievement_Sound

Props to the official Xbox forum users for sharing when they can. Props to http://xbox360rally.com for all my 360 news. Props to http://Destructoid.com best online video game magazine blog ever Also, cocks. Piratebay4ever.
